headline: Affirm Holdings (NasdaqGS:AFRM) Partners With Shopmonkey To Offer Flexible Auto Repair Financing
summary: Affirm Holdings (NasdaqGS:AFRM) recently partnered with Shopmonkey, making Affirm a default pay-over-time option for many auto shops, enhancing financing flexibility for small businesses and their customers. This alliance likely bolstered its share price by 40% over the past quarter, indicating significant investor confidence in its potential for growth. Additionally, Affirm's expansion of partnerships with major companies like Costco and Williams-Sonoma into Canadian markets, coupled with a...

headline: Canadian man livid after bank deems $35K worth of charges from all over the world on his credit card are legit
summary: “Passwords, virus protection. I don’t know how things were compromised."

headline: 3 Stocks That Could Create Lasting Generational Wealth
summary: Amazon's lead in e-commerce and cloud computing, along with its growing ad business, will continue to deliver for years to come.  Costco continues to offer substantial value to customers and is attracting members from across all income levels.  Warren Buffett is leaving Berkshire Hathaway in capable hands -- and with substantial cash, a lucrative investment portfolio, and well-diversified businesses.
